A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not the sequel you're looking for. No\, in all seriousness\, this could could have been a standalone installment. It did nothing to build on what Force Awakens started. It's a fun ride\, don't doubt that it is\, but it doesn't lead anywhere and leaves you fairly unfulfilled if you're looking for the main story arc in between action and pretty scenery.
